pkgmetadata.longdescription: Quantile Recalibration for Regression Models // Enables the diagnostics and enhancement of regression model calibration.It offers both global and local visualization tools for calibration diagnostics and provides one recalibration method: Torres R, Nott DJ, Sisson SA, Rodrigues T, Reis JG, Rodrigues GS (2024) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2403.05756. The method leverages on Probabilistic Integral Transform (PIT) values to both evaluate and perform the calibration of statistical models. For a more detailed description of the package, please refer to the bachelor's thesis available bellow.
